smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

The function additionKeywordTest is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onFeedShareClickTest is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

smells.name: ComplexInterface

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: RedundantVisibilityModifierRule
smells.description: Checks for redundant visibility modifiers. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.

instances.message: UrlReceiveActivity is explicitly marked as public. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.
WrapContentHeightViewPager is explicitly marked as public. Public is the default visibility for classes. The public modifier is redundant.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: org.scribe.builder.api.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
org.scribe.model.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
retrofit2.http.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.widget.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class StarOfBookmarkResponse implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class EntryResponse implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class StarResponse implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class ColoredStarResponse implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class BookmarkResponse implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class Stars implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class Bookmark implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
